con:part.con:content: <definitions targetNamespace="ld:DescontoFixa/logical/DescontoFixa_ws" name="DescontoFixa" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="ld:DescontoFixa/logical/DescontoFixa_ws" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <documentation>AquaLogic Data Services Web Service</documentation> <types> <xs:schema targetNamespace="ld:DescontoFixa/logical/DescontoFixa_ws" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:stns="ld:DescontoFixa/logical/DescontoFixa_ws" xmlns:dsns0="http://www.vivo.com.br/nfo/catalogoPRS/Desconto"> <xs:import namespace="http://www.vivo.com.br/nfo/catalogoPRS/Desconto"/> <xs:element name="descontoFixa"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="parametros"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="dsns0:ParamDescontoFixa"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="descontoFixaResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="dsns0:ResultDescontoFixa" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.vivo.com.br/SN/CatalogoWeb/FN_BUSCARSOLICITACAOCOMERCIAL" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.vivo.com.br/SN/CatalogoWeb/FN_BUSCARSOLICITACAOCOMERCIAL"> <xsd:element name="FN_BUSCARSOLICITACAOCOMERCIAL"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="IDSOLICITACAOCOMERCIAL" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="CDSOLICITACAOCOMERCIAL" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="NMOPERACAOCOMERCIAL" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="INOFERTACLIENTEINADIMPLENTE" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="PZDIASMAXIMOATENDIMENTO" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="PZMESVALIDADEPARQUE" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.vivo.com.br/SN/CatalogoWeb/FN_BUSCARDESCONTOFIXA" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.vivo.com.br/SN/CatalogoWeb/FN_BUSCARDESCONTOFIXA"> <xsd:element name="FN_BUSCARDESCONTOFIXA"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="IDSISTEMASERVICO" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="CDCODIGO" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="CDCLASSESERVICOADICIONAL" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="CDTIPOEQUIPAMENTO" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="INPRECIFICAOLEGADO" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> <!--Ainda não está aplicado--> <xsd:element name="INPREFACTIBILIDADE" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="INPOSFACTIBILIDADE" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="QTPERCENTUALAUDITORIA" type="xsd:decimal" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="CDSYSCOM" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="NUORDEMATENDIMENTO" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="NMCOMERCIAL" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="DESCRICAO" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="DSNOTA" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="TXNATUREZAORDEM" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <!--Verificar com Paulo, pois acredito que deveria estar dentro do tipo 'solicitacoesComerciais'--> <xsd:element name="INDISPONIVEL" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="CDTIPOSERVICO" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="DSTIPOSERVICO" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="CDFAMILIA" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="DSFAMILIA" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="CDCATEGORIA" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="DSCATEGORIA" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="INATRIBUTOSERVICO" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="IDSISTEMA" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="SQPEDIDO" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <!--Verificar com Paulo, pois até o momento o campo não está especificado--> <xsd:element name="INSTATUSANALISECREDITO" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="SGTIPOAPLICACAODESCONTO" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="TXDESCONTO" type="xsd:decimal"/> <xsd:element name="IDCOMPOSICAOPROMOCAO" type="xsd:long"/> <xsd:element name="DTINICIO" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="DTFIM" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.vivo.com.br/nfo/catalogoPRS/Desconto" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:pag="http://www.vivo.com.br/nfo/catalogoWEB"> <xsd:element name="ParamDescontoFixa"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="cdCanalAtendimento" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="cdSistemaOrigem" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="cdTipoSolicitacaoComercial" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="cdClasseLinha" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="cdPlanoMinutos" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="cdAreaConcorrencia" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="cdGrupoComercial" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="cdFamiliaDesconto" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="cdCategoriaDesconto" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="cdServico" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="nmDesconto" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="inVigenciaServico" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:int"> <xsd:enumeration value="1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="analiseCredito" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="cdScore" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="inStatusAnaliseCredito" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="paginacao" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="pagina" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="quantidadePorPagina" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.vivo.com.br/nfo/catalogoPRS/Desconto" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:pag="http://www.vivo.com.br/nfo/catalogoWEB" xmlns:tns="http://www.vivo.com.br/nfo/catalogoPRS/Desconto"> <xsd:element name="ResultDescontoFixa"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="codigo" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="descricao" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="servicos" type="tns:ListaServicoDisponivel" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="ListaServicoDisponivel"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="servicoDisponivel" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="cdDesconto" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="cdClasseServicoAdicional" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="cdAtributoClasseAdicional" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="nmDesconto" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="dsDesconto" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="dsNotaDesconto" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="inAtributosDesconto" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="inVigenciaDesconto" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="vlOrdemAtendimento" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="vlPercentualAuditoria" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="cdFamiliaDesconto" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="dsFamiliaDesconto" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="cdCategoriaDesconto" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="dsCategoriaDesconto" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="solicitacoesComerciais" type="tns:ListaSolicitacaoComercial" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="desconto" type="tns:Desconto"/> <xsd:element name="sequenciaPedido" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="inStatusAnaliseCredito" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="dtInicialVigencia" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="dtFinalVigencia" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ListaSolicitacaoComercial"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="solicitacaoComercial" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="cdSolicitacaoComercial" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="nmSolicitacaoComercial" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="vlPrazoMaximoAtendimento" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="vlPrazoVigenciaDesconto" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="Desconto"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="unidade" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="valor" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="descontoFixaIn"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:descontoFixa"/> </message> <message name="descontoFixaOut"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:descontoFixaResponse"/> </message> <portType name="DescontoFixaPT"> <operation name="descontoFixa"> <input message="tns:descontoFixaIn"/> <output message="tns:descontoFixaOut"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="DescontoFixaSoapBinding" type="tns:DescontoFixaPT"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" style="document"/> <operation name="descontoFixa"> <soap:operation soapAction="ld:DescontoFixa/logical/DescontoFixa_ws/descontoFixa" style="document"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="DescontoFixaSoapService"> <port binding="tns:DescontoFixaSoapBinding" name="DescontoFixaSoapPort"> <soap:address location="http://aldsp-soa:80/ServicosEnablementCatalogoFixa/ALDSPWebService/DescontoFixa/logical/DescontoFixa.ws"/> </port> </service> </definitions>
